name: nssf-pensioner-portal
description: NSSF Pensioner Self-Service Portal - Secure web platform for retirees

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend

author: NSSF Uganda IT Department
